text: A board may issue a temporary license, registration, or certification to an applicant for a fixed period of time, under conditions prescribed by the Mayor through rulemaking, who is licensed, registered, or certified and in good standing to practice in another jurisdiction.
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(e)(9) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-26, see notes following § 3-1201.01.

DC CODE § 3-1205.08a

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Licensing, Registration, or Certification of Health Professionals.
